description: This version of the  Man in Tuxedo emoji has the  Light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Pale Skin Tone on supported platforms
apple_vendor_description: The man in a tuxedo emoji on Apple devices showcases a distinguished gentleman with a light skin tone, impeccably dressed for a formal occasion. Apple‚Äôs design brings out the texture of the tuxedo fabric through realistic lighting and smooth gradients, while the softened bow tie and lapels add a touch of refined elegance. This emoji, with its polished finish and subtle 3D depth on Apple devices, is perfect for signaling celebrations, special events, or a sense of sophisticated style.
